mapper.insert: insert into employee (eno, ename, salary, dno, gender, joindate, title) values (#{eno}, #{ename}, #{salary}, #{dno}, #{gender}, #{joindate}, #{title})
mapper.select: select eno, ename, salary, dno, gender, joindate, title from employee
select eno, ename, salary, dno, gender, joindate, title from employee order by eno desc limit 1
